entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Otherwise sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
